com.github.triceo.splitlog

Interface Follower

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommonFollower, MessageDeliveryNotificationSource

    public interface Follower
extends CommonFollower, MessageDeliveryNotificationSource
    On top of the CommonFollower's functions, this allows for merging followers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LogWatch getFollowed()
      Retrieve the log watch that is being followed.
      boolean isFollowing()
      Whether or not this follower is still capable of receiving messages from LogWatch.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.triceo.splitlog.CommonFollower

        getMessages, getMessages, getMessages, getMessages, mergeWith, tag, waitFor, waitFor, write, write, write, write, write, write, write, write

    • Method Detail

      • getFollowed

        LogWatch getFollowed()
        Retrieve the log watch that is being followed.
        Returns:
        The LogWatch whose LogWatch.follow() was called to obtain reference to this follower.

      • isFollowing

        boolean isFollowing()
        Whether or not this follower is still capable of receiving messages from LogWatch. It is suggested that the reference to this follower be thrown away immediately after the user has processed the results of CommonFollower.getMessages() or CommonFollower.getMessages(MessageCondition). LogWatch may then be able to free the memory occupied by those messages.
        Returns:
        True if following.
